Segment.Title: Script Products
Segment.Query: select distinct(product.name) from workflowaction wfa left join workflow w on wfa.workflowid = w.id left join keyaction ka on wfa.keyactionid = ka.id left join systemarea sa on ka.systemareaid = sa.id left join module m on sa.moduleid = m.id left join testscript ts on w.testscriptid = ts.id left join project pr on ts.projectid = pr.id left join client cl on pr.clientid = cl.id left join product on m.productid = product.id where w.name = 'Wierd Inbound Plan' and ts.name = 'Inbound Planning' and pr.name = 'WEGM-234' and cl.name = 'Wegmans Food Market' and m.name not in ('');

Segment.Title: Script Modules
Segment.Query: select distinct(m.name) from workflowaction wfa left join workflow w on wfa.workflowid = w.id left join keyaction ka on wfa.keyactionid = ka.id left join systemarea sa on ka.systemareaid = sa.id left join module m on sa.moduleid = m.id left join testscript ts on w.testscriptid = ts.id left join project pr on ts.projectid = pr.id left join client cl on pr.clientid = cl.id where w.name = 'Wierd Inbound Plan' and ts.name = 'Inbound Planning' and pr.name = 'WEGM-234' and cl.name = 'Wegmans Food Market' and m.name not in ('');

Segment.Title: Script System Areas
Segment.Query: select distinct(sa.name) from workflowaction wfa left join workflow w on wfa.workflowid = w.id left join keyaction ka on wfa.keyactionid = ka.id left join systemarea sa on ka.systemareaid = sa.id left join module m on sa.moduleid = m.id left join testscript ts on w.testscriptid = ts.id left join project pr on ts.projectid = pr.id left join client cl on pr.clientid = cl.id where w.name = 'Wierd Inbound Plan' and ts.name = 'Inbound Planning' and pr.name = 'WEGM-234' and cl.name = 'Wegmans Food Market' and m.name not in ('');

Segment.Title: ?0 - ?1 - ?2 Script Overview
Segment.Query: select w.name, ka.name, ka.description, ka.custom, wa.expectedresult from (((((workflowaction wa left join workflownextaction wna on wa.id = wna.keyactionid) left join workflow w on w.id = wa.workflowid) left join keyaction ka on wa.keyactionid = ka.id) left join testscript ts on ts.id = w.testscriptid) left join project p on ts.projectid = p.id) left join client c on p.clientid = c.id where ts.name = '?0' and p.name = '?1' and c.name = '?2' order by w.id, wna.nextactionid;
